hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD6$ hundreds, $\purpleD2$ tens, and $\purpleD2$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{622}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/bcf20c72d99a5d292c3dc9ec3a8aacb1fedd7a13)

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD3$ hundreds, $\maroonD0$ tens, and $\maroonD5$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{305}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/237752a8ccf58af73b1ec467c557a465e877786c)

Together, there are $\blueE9$ hundreds, $\blueE2$ tens, and $\blueE7$ ones.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/d01143b17af869ed4b3911e2685c77e033f3d9e8)

$900 + 20 +7 =\blueE{927}$

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleE{622} + \maroonD{305} = \blueE{927}$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented by the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/bd50e1bcf3faea4a51aacf253b92067ac581f64b)

[[☃ radio 1]]
